channel.title: Comments on: A Few Notes About Creating Custom SSMS Reports
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Chris Fleming
item.dc:creator: Chris Fleming
item.content:encoded:
Nice post, first I’ve seen on how and where to add the custom RDL to SSMS, you’ve just saved me some time – thanks!

It’s always fun to reveal this capability in SSMS to others, truly useful stuff.
